meanings.sent1: The multiwall building provided extra insulation in the cold winter.
meanings.sent2: The multiwall glass windows were more durable than single-pane ones.
meanings.sent3: The multiwall fortress was so secure that even the strongest winds couldn't knock it down.
meanings.sent4: Her multiwall defense strategy in the game made it nearly impossible for her opponent to win.
meanings.sent5: The multiwall structure stood tall and strong against any external force.

meanings.definition: A structure made up of several layers of walls.
meanings.sent1: The ancient castle was a massive multiwall that protected the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The multiwall surrounding the garden kept out unwanted animals.
meanings.sent3: The multiwall around the house made it feel like a fortress.
meanings.sent4: The multiwall of the dam prevented the river from flooding the town.
meanings.sent5: The multiwall of the bunker provided safety during the storm.
